short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FreePDFApp is a powerful PDF converter tool. Convert PDF to DOC and DOC to PDF with just a simple drag-and-drop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FREEPDFAPP is a top-notch PDF productivity tool that will get you covered!
FREEPDFAPP is a powerful PDF converter tool. Converts DOC, XLS, PPT, and more into PDF files and from PDF back to DOC.  

simply by dragging and dropping. It only takes a few seconds, and using it is totally free.
You may access the converting tool in your browser by adding this extension to Chrome.


Try it today!
